name: SpaceTrouble (JakobSailer)
description:
What started as a simple Uni Project has lead to countless hours of fun developing this little game.

You'll find yourself thrown into an isometric tile world made up of floating crystals and odd looking minions, that will help you distribute resources to the countless construction you placed to try and defeat the ever increasing waves of spider leged aliens trying to overwhelm you.

You will have to figure out a well balanced strategy of resource management and construction timing to stand a chance.

Your end goal is to try and reach all portals and place a laboratory with a strong laser pointing stright into the portal on all four portals. If youve managed to do so a last massive continues wave of enemies will spread over your platforms, which you will have to hold back until the final wave is defeated and the game is won.

To keep you interested even after a couple of games you can try and beat even the hardest difficulty settings and collect statistics and achievements while doing so
